Name: JW Mindful Travel Kit
Short_Description:
• Multiple award winning Deep Relax Bath & Shower Oil provides relaxing aromas of earthy Vetiver, soothing Chamomile and comforting Sandalwood (0.3 oz)
  • Award-winning Revive Morning Bath & Shower Oil gives an invigorating lift of Juniper Berry and Neroli coupled with hangover and late night banishing Grapefruit essential oils (0.3 oz)
  • De-Stress Muscle Gel treats aching muscles by using the powers of Rosemary, Black Pepper, Lavender and Ginger essential oils (1.35 oz)
  • Support Breathe Roller Ball is a natural blend of fine essential oils of Pine, Tea Tree and Eucalyptus work to ease breathing and refresh the senses (0.34 oz)
  • Set comes in a see-through wristlet
Description: <headline>Alleviate the stress and strain of traveling by activating your senses.</headline><details>Traveling is truly a wonderful experience that can broaden our horizons and re-energize and relax us.  However, all too often traveling brings with it its own stresses and strains.  JW Marriott Spa Partner Aromatherapy Associates explain how your sense of smell can be your most trusted travel companion when tackling the trials of travel â€“ leaving you able to reverse the burnout, enjoy the little things and make the most of whatâ€™s to come.</details>
